name: BC FLOORS - Hardwood Floors, Carpet, Tile, Vinyl, Flooring Contractor

owner.name: BC FLOORS - Hardwood Floors, Carpet, Tile, Vinyl, Flooring Contractor (Owner)

address: BC FLOORS - Hardwood Floors, Carpet, Tile, Vinyl, Flooring Contractor, 4954 Victoria Dr, Vancouver, BC V5P 3T6

featured_reviews.review_id:
I manage large construction projects across Canada, but when it came to renovating my own condo I was nervous about the quality of trade I would get for a small space.

I wish that every sub trade was as strong as BC Floors. Keit the project manager was communicative and professional. She kept me regularly up to date through texts and phone calls throughout the work. The workers were respectful and diligent.

We installed a new lvt floor. BC Floors looked after the demolition and new install. The team met an aggressive timeline and the final product is extremely well done.

10/10
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.review_id: I had existing floors refinished, carpets replaced by engineered hardwood, and laminate floors installed in the basement. I strongly recommend using BC Floors. Nikita coordinated all aspects of the project, providing excellent guidance through the planning phase while providing regular updates throughout the work. The workmanship is high quality, and we are happy with our floors.
featured_reviews.review_text: I had existing floors refinished, carpets replaced by engineered hardwood, and laminate floors installed in the basement. I strongly recommend using BC Floors. Nikita coordinated all aspects of the project, providing excellent guidance through the planning phase while providing regular updates throughout the work. The workmanship is high quality, and we are happy with our floors.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much for your kind words

featured_reviews.review_id:
Installation was decent overall, but they messed up one of the rooms and had to cover it up with awkward looking panels near the edges where the floor ends at floor-to-ceiling windows.

Other issues:
- Original expectations were that they would do the kitchen flooring as well. But they bailed on doing the entire floor because of some custom cabinetry that is raised above the flooring on elevated stilts. So half of the kitchen flooring is incomplete (old flooring hidden under the cabinetry). Would have been much better to be up front about that at the beginning.

- They promised to replace our baseboards, but during the renovations they said the original baseboards were fine and asked if they would just use those. We ask for them to go ahead with new ones thing they would do the full job. Instead they cut new baseboards without painting them properly and never added caulking. So we were left to do that our selves.

- They messed up one of our closet doors (couldn't get it to fit back in) so they cut it. Now the one door doesn't match the height of the other.

Overall, a lot of the issues could have been prevented with better communication on their part before and during the project. They also rushed at the end to finish up. We offered to give them more time, but they already had other projects waiting to go right afterwards.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Steve, I apologize for this. My team has been reaching out to you but you haven't replied. Can you please reply to our team so they can discuss how we can correct ? Thanks

featured_reviews.review_id:
Recently, BC Floors completed a superb flooring project at my home. Lawrence, the project manager organized every detail with precision, expedience in a highly organized manner. From the project onset of determining measurements and multiple components to the installation finality, a meticulous approach occurred throughout each task. The project's professional installers, Jhoemar and Juan completed my vinyl sheet installations with perfection. Their politeness, hard work ethic, and installation knowledge was remarkable.
BC Floors is a Five Star company that most certainly places customers as their priority! Lawrence is a highly detailed and professional project manager who is extremely knowledgeable with customer's requirements.
I very much recommend BC Floors for any of your flooring needs.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I found Keit and her colleagues at BC Floors to be professional, reliable, and honest.   Her crew were very experienced and courteous, and were a pleasure to deal with during my project.

Loving my new hardwood floors, and would recommend BC Floors without any hesitation!!
featured_reviews.review_text:

Loving my new hardwood floors, and would recommend BC Floors without any hesitation!!

featured_reviews.review_id: I recently had a very good experience using Lawrence (the project manager) and his team (led by Jhoemar the installer) at BC Floors on a home renovation project that I'm working on in Coquitlam. They are one of the most professional, easy-to-deal with and reliable carpet supply-and-install companies that you will find in Vancouver. If you want a quality product coupled with hassle and headache-free service, then BC Floors is the place to go.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much for your kind words

featured_reviews.review_id: I was happy I connected with Lawrence to do our floors. He is a great project manager, easy to communicate with and is respectful of everyone's time frame. He brought in Emerson and Jhoemar who did a great removal and installation job and have eye for detail; respectful and great professionals to work with.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I'm glad to share my positive experience of working with Keit at BC FLOORS during the purchase of Coswick flooring for my new house. Keit's service was outstanding from product selection and finally delivery. What really stood out was her dedication to solving problems When concerns arose about color discrepancies in the flooring, Keit engaged with the supplier to address the issue and ensure our satisfaction were exceptional.

I highly recommend Keit at BC FLOOR. Her professionalism and customer focus made our project a success. Thanks to her, we have fantastic Coswick flooring and a stress-free experience.
